languages.text: {n}Женщина достает из складок одежды стеклянную призму и с издевательским смешком смотрит сквозь нее на вас. Голубовато-розовый отблеск призмы отпечатывается на вашей сетчатке, словно его на ней выжгли.{/n} "Угадай, что я вижу, когда смотрю на тебя".

{n}The woman takes a glass prism out of the folds of her clothes, and looks at you through it with a mocking chuckle. The prism's bluish-pink sheen imprints itself on your retinas as though it has been burned into them.{/n} "Guess what I see when I look at you."
languages.original_text: {n}Женщина достает из складок одежды стеклянную призму и с издевательским смешком смотрит сквозь нее на вас. Голубовато-розовый отблеск призмы отпечатывается на вашей сетчатке, словно его на ней выжгли.{/n} "Угадай, что я вижу, когда смотрю на тебя".

traits.locale_text: {n}The woman produces a glass prism from between the folds of her clothes, and looks at you through it with a mocking chuckle. The prism's blue-and-pink sheen imprints itself on your retinas, as though burned into them.{/n} "Guess what I see when I look at you."

{n}The woman produces a glass prism from between the folds of her clothes, and looks at you through it with a mocking chuckle. The prism's blue-and-pink sheen imprints itself on your retinas, as though burned into them.{/n} "Guess what I see when I look at you."

{n}The woman takes a glass prism out of the folds of her clothes, and looks at you through it with a mocking chuckle. The prism's bluish-pink sheen imprints itself on your retinas as though it has been burned into them.{/n} "Guess what I see when I look at you."

languages.text: {n}Die Frau zieht ein Glasprisma aus den Falten ihrer Kleidung und blickt dich mit einem spöttischen Kichern durch das Glas hindurch an. Der bläulich-pinke Schein es Prismas bleibt auf deiner Netzhaut hängen, als sei er hineingebrannt worden.{/n} "Ratet einmal, was ich sehe, wenn ich Euch ansehe."
languages.original_text: {n}The woman takes a glass prism out of the folds of her clothes, and looks at you through it with a mocking chuckle. The prism's bluish-pink sheen imprints itself on your retinas as though it has been burned into them.{/n} "Guess what I see when I look at you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Frau zieht ein Glasprisma aus den Falten ihrer Kleidung und blickt dich mit einem spöttischen Kichern durch das Glas hindurch an. Der bläulich-pinke Schein es Prismas bleibt auf deiner Netzhaut hängen, als sei er hineingebrannt worden.{/n} "Ratet einmal, was ich sehe, wenn ich Euch ansehe."

languages.text: {n}La femme sort un prisme de verre des replis de ses vêtements et vous regarde à travers avec un ricanement moqueur. L'éclat bleu-rosé du prisme s'imprime sur vos rétines, comme s'il y était gravé.{/n} « Savez-vous ce que je vois, quand je vous regarde ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The woman takes a glass prism out of the folds of her clothes, and looks at you through it with a mocking chuckle. The prism's bluish-pink sheen imprints itself on your retinas as though it has been burned into them.{/n} "Guess what I see when I look at you."

traits.locale_text: {n}La femme sort un prisme de verre des replis de ses vêtements et vous regarde à travers avec un ricanement moqueur. L'éclat bleu-rosé du prisme s'imprime sur vos rétines, comme s'il y était gravé.{/n} « Savez-vous ce que je vois, quand je vous regarde ? »

languages.text: {n}这个女人从衣服的褶皱里拿出一块玻璃棱镜，一边发出讥讽的笑声，一边透过它观察你。棱镜蓝粉色的光映在你的视网膜上，你感觉你的眼睛仿佛都被灼伤了。{/n}“猜猜看，猜我在你身上看到了什么。”
languages.original_text: {n}The woman takes a glass prism out of the folds of her clothes, and looks at you through it with a mocking chuckle. The prism's bluish-pink sheen imprints itself on your retinas as though it has been burned into them.{/n} "Guess what I see when I look at you."

traits.locale_text: {n}这个女人从衣服的褶皱里拿出一块玻璃棱镜，一边发出讥讽的笑声，一边透过它观察你。棱镜蓝粉色的光映在你的视网膜上，你感觉你的眼睛仿佛都被灼伤了。{/n}“猜猜看，猜我在你身上看到了什么。”

languages.text: {n}女は服の折り目からガラスのプリズムを取り出し、プリズム越しにこちらを嘲笑いながら見つめてくる。プリズムの青みがかったピンクの輝きが、網膜を焼くかのように刻み付けられる。{/n}「私が貴様に何を見ているのか、当ててみろ」
languages.original_text: {n}The woman takes a glass prism out of the folds of her clothes, and looks at you through it with a mocking chuckle. The prism's bluish-pink sheen imprints itself on your retinas as though it has been burned into them.{/n} "Guess what I see when I look at you."

traits.locale_text: {n}女は服の折り目からガラスのプリズムを取り出し、プリズム越しにこちらを嘲笑いながら見つめる。プリズムの青みがかったピンクのキラキラが、網膜を焼くかのように刻み付けられた。{/n}「貴様を見て何が見えるか当ててみろ」

languages.text: {n}La mujer saca un prisma de cristal de entre los pliegues de su ropa y te mira a través de él con una risita burlona. El brillo rosa y azulado del prisma se refleja en sus retinas, como grabado a fuego.{/n} «Adivina lo que veo cuando te miro».
languages.original_text: {n}The woman takes a glass prism out of the folds of her clothes, and looks at you through it with a mocking chuckle. The prism's bluish-pink sheen imprints itself on your retinas as though it has been burned into them.{/n} "Guess what I see when I look at you."

traits.locale_text: {n}La mujer saca un prisma de cristal de entre los pliegues de su ropa y te mira a través de él con una risita burlona. El brillo rosa y azulado del prisma se refleja en sus retinas, como grabado a fuego.{/n} «Adivina lo que veo cuando te miro».

languages.text: {n}Kadın, kıyafetinin katmanları arasından cam bir prizma çıkarıyor ve dalga geçercesine gülerek prizmanın içinden sana bakıyor. Prizmanın mavi pembemsi ışıltısı, retinalarında âdeta dağlanmış gibi bir iz bırakıyor.{/n} "Sana baktığımda ne gördüğümü tahmin et."
languages.original_text: {n}The woman takes a glass prism out of the folds of her clothes, and looks at you through it with a mocking chuckle. The prism's bluish-pink sheen imprints itself on your retinas as though it has been burned into them.{/n} "Guess what I see when I look at you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kadın, kıyafetinin katmanları arasından cam bir prizma çıkarıyor ve dalga geçercesine kıkırdayarak prizma aracılığıyla sana bakıyor. Prizmanın mavi pembemsi ışıltısı, retinalarında âdeta dağlanmış gibi bir iz bırakıyor.{/n} "Sana baktığımda ne gördüğümü tahmin et."
